properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Contingancies 10%

properties.Name of Spring and place: Watershed area of Datriya lower division (belongs to Thundeniya GND yet use by Gampolawatta GND)
properties.Observation: This land is located on the boundary of Thundeniya GND and Gampolawattha GND and borders privet lands.  Land is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Contingancies 10%
